docs.text: Welcome Welcome to the Retrievium Docs! Currently, most of the information on how to run things exists in the main repo itself . Powered by mkdocs.org . The docs themselves live within this repository , PRs are welcome!
docs.title: Welcome

docs.text: Welcome to the Retrievium Docs! Currently, most of the information on how to run things exists in the main repo itself . Powered by mkdocs.org . The docs themselves live within this repository , PRs are welcome!
docs.title: Welcome

docs.text: Tasks Data Ingestion Ingestion of existing data on compute canada into new system Search based on formula Search based on functional group Search based on number of ring atoms Search based on number of specific atoms Visuals 2D/3D structure display based on information in CML (more expansive than just smiles-based 3D view) Restore spectra diagrams Searching / Navigation Implement paging Clear search Next to the 'Search' button, add a new button, that is red, and states 'Clear'. When you click it, all of the search fields should be cleared. Clean-up of labels displayed in search results (ie. Not CML tags) Implement selection options for information to be displayed in search results Add feature to download files (ex. Gaussian input file, Cartesians, molfile) Sliders to search for items with numerical values Drop-down menus for search criteria with fixed options (ex. Basis set) Misc / Future Hide retrievium information in raw CML Users for retrievium.ca User upload of files – staging area Input SMILES of reactants and products and get delta H
